name: 1709 Fifth
description:
Say hello to 1709 Fifth and its design driven details and timeless architecture. Now open, this brand new 51-unit boutique property with studio, 1 & 2BR options perfectly compliments your urban lifestyle. Add to the perk of the property Redhawk Coffee + Market, located on the ground floor, is open daily for your morning iced coffee on the way out the door or a quick grab-and-go salad for lunch. 

Be one of the first to call your stunning pet-friendly unit home featuring Whirlpool stainless appliances, kitchen islands, custom lighting, oversized windows with blinds, in-unit washer & dryers, tiled baths, private terraces with sweeping city views, covered parking and more. As a member of the PGH 2030 district, eco-friendly finishes are at the forefront of the building including efficient heating/cool systems (read: low electric bills!), a living roof, bike storage and a location along Pittsburgh's first bus rapid transit system which will shuttle our residents to Downtown and Oakland/Universities in under five minutes. Ready to upgrade to Uptown?

description:
Available: NOW!

Description:
Introducing a recently updated 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment in the desirable Swissvale neighborhood of Pittsburgh, PA. This charming unit features a newly remodeled bathroom, shared washer/dryer for added convenience, and comes equipped with essential appliances including a fridge, stove/range, and dishwasher. With its prime location and modern amenities, this apartment offers a comfortable and convenient living space for those looking to call Swissvale home. Easy to maintain. Add your own finishing touches to make this your perfect home.

Call us for an appointment today. It looks even better in person!

Amenities:
Fridge, stove/oven (gas), dishwasher, shared washer/dryer in basement, street parking, forced air gas heat, back deck, cable ready, hardwood floors, yard

Terms:
- Utilities paid by tenant: Gas and Electric
- Security deposit of one month's rent
- Some pets are allowed. Monthly pet fee ($35 per pet). Max 2 pets. No deposit!
- $55 application fee per adult for credit/criminal/eviction check
- NO SMOKING (Inside or Outside)
- $55 monthly Tenant Benefits Package (tenant insurance, utility concierge, credit building, etc.)

All RPM Pittsburgh residents are enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package, which includes liability insurance, credit building to help boost the resident's credit score with timely rent payments, $1M Identity Theft Protection, HVAC air filter delivery, move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and more! More details upon application.

Minimum Qualifications:
- Credit score of 700+ is preferred but will consider applicants with a credit score of 600+ with an extra fee. Under 600 will be considered with a cosigner and/or a security deposit of 2 months rent
- Must gross at least 3 times the monthly rent
- Must be able to move in within a minimum of 30 days from the availability date
- No utility accounts in collections
- No felonies within the last 7 years
- No evictions within the last 7 years

About us:
At Real Property Management Pittsburgh, our mission is to offer residents exceptional, safe, and well-maintained housing. We are dedicated to enhancing both lives and communities through our commitment to continuously elevate the standards of property management.

name: Hillcrest Residences Senior Community
description:
62+, senior restricted community. All Utilities Included! Limited availability!

Hillcrest Residences is a newly constructed community located in the Carrick neighborhood, just down the street from Brentwood Towne Square. A desirable living option for the older generation in search of an updated, comfortable, and social living experience. This community is located near a vast variety of shopping and dining, but maintains a neighborhood feel.

Hillcrest Residences offers a quality living option with beautifully landscaped grounds, spacious floor plans, and modern amenities without leaving the Carrick neighborhood. Our valued residents will have the prestige to live in beautiful newly constructed one and two bedroom apartment homes. Hillcrest makes it easy to mingle with neighbors, friends, and family in our spacious resident lounge and beautifully landscaped grounds. We make sure you have the opportunity for a healthy and tranquil living experience with a private room for health services, modern fitness center, and sun room.

In addition, Hillcrest Residences is located next to Rite Aid, Dunkin Donuts, and PNC Bank making every day conveniences just steps away. Connect with the neighborhood with a short bus ride to Station Square, where you will find local events, over a dozen restaurants, and the opportunity to explore local Art and Music events. Travel to SouthSide Works, The Mall at Robinson, or Ross Park Mall to enjoy a day at the spa, watch a newly released movie, a gourmet meal, and so much more.

Contact our professional leasing staff today and find out how you can become a valued member of our community! Income restrictions apply to select homes. Rent is subject to change at anytime. Layouts and finishes may vary by home. EHO and ADA. TTY: 711

name: Cosmopolitan Apartments
description:
Welcome to the Cosmopolitan Apartments! Our brand new apartment community offers modern living at it's finest in a location that is equally as impressive.

Treat yourself to convenient, upscale living in an apartment community like no other at the Cosmopolitan Apartments in Ross Township, just outside Pittsburgh, PA. Large open floor plans with one and two-bedroom options are the perfect complement to your modern lifestyle. Gourmet kitchens complete with quartz countertops, a full range of stainless steel appliances, and a breakfast bar brighten your day, while the private patio or balcony creates a unique outdoor space all your own.

Our new community is located in the charming North Hills neighborhood, close to I-279 for a quick commute to downtown Pittsburgh. We are also situated in the highly rated North Hills School District. As a resident, you will enjoy a luxury package of community amenities full of health-boosting and high-tech benefits to enhance your lifestyle. De-stress with a great read on our rooftop terrace and sundeck. The fitness center is stocked with free weights and cardio machines, and is open 24 hours a day so you can always find the right time for a workout.

No matter what lifestyle you enjoy, you'll love our beautiful, pet friendly living spaces at Cosmopolitan, an apartment community like no other. Once you've browsed through our photo gallery and seen what we have to offer, give us a call to schedule a tour or go ahead and apply online today. We can't wait to welcome you to your new home!

This 1st floor apartment features in unit laundry, a private deck, hardwood floors, tall ceiling with ceiling fans, new windows, and plenty of closet space. The kitchen is open to the living room and has granite counters, custom cabinets, track lighting, garbage disposal, and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, built in microwave, high BTU glass top stove, and refrigerator with French doors. The bathroom has a walk in shower, large vanity and a wall of exposed brick. Landlord pays water, sewage, and trash. Tenant pays gas & electric. There is a high efficiency furnace and central AC. 
This building in North Oakland has been recently renovated. All of the plumbing, wiring, insulation, windows, cabinets, and granite are new. There are three stories with 4 apartments on each floor. Each unit has a private deck, stainless appliances, in unit laundry, and storage in the basement. 

It's a 15-20 minute walk to the University of Pittsburgh and Carnegie Mellon campuses. 
Parking is on street. No City permit needed. 
All our properties are pet friendly for friendly pets with a two-animal maximum. There are no breed or weight restrictions. We require proof of rabies vaccinations (and licenses for dogs), but we do not charge additional rent or fees for animals. 
Smoking is not permitted in any of our properties.

name: Lofts of Mount Washington
description:
Prospect School was built during the depression (1917-1931) after the original school burned down. Designed by local architects James T. Steen and Sons, you can see the art deco styling in the schools boxy shape, intricate details and asymmetrical patters. In 2005, Prospect School closed and remained vacant until renovations on these apartments began in 2014 by developer a.m. RODRIGUEZ ASSOCIATES inc. 

Going further back in time, The Mount Washington area blossomed with the construction of the Mon Incline in 1870, which made this area easily accessible. Today, the neighborhood has grown in popularity, boasting two inclines, the Grandview Overlook, and Shiloh Street Shops. These destinations bring people from all over the city, while Mount Washington residents enjoy convenient access to dining, shopping, entertainment, and more!
